prompt:
Nurse: I'm glad to hear that you're doing okay, Mr. Peck. Is there anything you're looking forward to doing this week?

Patient: Yes. I'm going to the theater.

Nurse: That sounds exciting, Mr. Peck! What play are you planning to see at the theater?

Patient: Samalite.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Peck, I didn't quite catch the name of the play. Could you please repeat it for me?

Patient: Camelot.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Peck, I didn't quite understand. Are you saying that you're experiencing a change in your speech?

Patient: No. We were talking about what play I was going to see. Never mind. We can move on.

responses.gpt4: Oh, I see. I apologize for misunderstanding, Mr. Peck. The title of the play is Camelot ��� what an excellent choice! Is there anything else we need to discuss regarding your health?
responses.our_model: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Of course, Mr. Peck. I apologize for any confusion earlier. You were saying you're going to see the play Camelot. That's wonderful! Are you a fan of theater and have you seen this play before?
